archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Establish Party Relationship
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Verify the party identity and manage a party's identity across the enterprise.

properties.value: Establish Party Relationship verifies that a party is who they claim they are to ensure only one party identity exists across an enterprise, which can be referenced across the whole enterprise and allows the party to quickly and easily identify itself, to establish and verify the Identity and to issue a unique Identifier and authentication information. Before establishing an identity for a new party it is essential to check that it does not already have an Identity with the Enterprise.
